title: Kante QA: integration testing + performance validation
description: Test all 231 players across 10 teams can open profiles. Verify no missing data crashes. Check modal load time <500ms. Verify mobile responsiveness. Run pytest to ensure no regressions. Validate JSON schema for all profiles. Check sample size indicators show correctly ((LOW) for <30 balls). Final system check before release.

florentino_gate.reason: Core product functionality surfacing existing data. Founder-mandated.
